unhollowerErrors.error:
We do not support the use of MelonLoader on Phasmophobia,
 nor does Phasmophobia support MelonLoader.
Please remove MelonLoader, Mods, Plugins, UserData, NOTICE.txt, and version.dll.

You are missing the required .NET Framework for MelonLoader.
Please make sure to install it using the following link: <https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-framework/net48>.

The access to a file has been denied. Please make sure the game is closed when installing MelonLoader, or try restarting your computer. If this doesn't work, try running the MelonLoader Installer with administrator privileges.

unhollowerErrors.regex: System.IO.IOException: The process cannot access the file '(?<filename>[\w.]+)'.*
unhollowerErrors.error: Access to file filename has been blocked. Please make sure the game or whatever has the file open is closed, or try restarting your computer. If this doesn't work, try running with administrator privileges and make sure your Virus scanner isn't interfering.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] System.IO.IOException: The process cannot access the file.*
unhollowerErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to open a required file. Most likely, your virus scanner is still scanning MelonLoader during execution or the user running MelonLoader does not have access. Try MelonLoader again, restarting your PC, or reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.
Access is denied. Make sure that your file permissions are set correctly. Try restarting your PC and whitelisting in your Virus scanner and reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*System\.UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path is denied\.
unhollowerErrors.error: Access is denied. Make sure that your Virus scanner is not blocking or removing MelonLoader files.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*SHA512 Hash from Temp File does not match Repo Hash!
unhollowerErrors.error: Installer failed to download MelonLoader successfully. Try again later or redownload the [official MelonLoader installer](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe).

unhollowerErrors.regex: Failed to get SHA512 Hash from Repo!
unhollowerErrors.error: Installer failed to download MelonLoader Hash. Try again later or redownload the [official MelonLoader installer](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe).
The access to a file has been denied. Please try starting the game with administrator privileges, or try restarting your computer (failed to save AssemblyGenerator/config.cfg)
The access to a file has been denied. Please try starting the game with administrator privileges, or try restarting your computer (failed to setup directories)

MelonLoader assembly generation failed. Please delete the `MelonLoader` folder and `version.dll` file from your game folder, and install MelonLoader $MLRelease$ again (failed to download Il2CppDumper)

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[INTERNAL FAILURE] Failed to Execute Assembly Generator!
unhollowerErrors.error: The assembly generation failed. This is most likely caused by your anti-virus. Add an exception or disable it, then try again. If that wasn't the issue then try accessing [this site](https://api.melonloader.com/api/v1/game/vrchat) and tell us if it loads.
GameAssembly is missing. Please verify the integrity of your game, and try again.
The assembly generation failed. Please update MelonLoader to $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Unhandled Exception: System\.IO\.IOException: There is not enough space on the disk\.
unhollowerErrors.error: The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again. You need at least 500MB free.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*---> System.IO.IOException: There is not enough space on the disk.
unhollowerErrors.error: The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again. You need at least 450MB free.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Unhandled Exception: System\.Collections\.Generic\.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary\.
unhollowerErrors.error: Key Not Found. This is most likely caused by your anti-virus. Add an exception or disable it, then reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] ERROR: Can't use auto mode to process file, try manual mode.
unhollowerErrors.error: Il2CppDumper generation failed. Please verify the integrity of your game or reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.
Missing Mono Directory. Please verify the integrity of your game or reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[INTERNAL FAILURE] Failed to Open Mono Assembly!
unhollowerErrors.error: Failed to Open Mono Assembly. Please make sure that the path is free of special characters and `'`.
Missing MelonLoader/MelonLoader.dll. Please do not move it or whitelist it in your virus scanner.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[INTERNAL FAILURE] Failed to Open Preload Assembly!
unhollowerErrors.error: Missing or currupt `MelonLoader\Dependencies\SupportModules\Preload.dll`. Please reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$ or whitelist it in your virus scanner.
Ran into obfuscation issues. Please update [MelonLoader](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe) to $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] Can't download Unity Dependencies, Unstripping will NOT be done!
unhollowerErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to download Unity Dependencies. There may be an issue with your firewall or your ISP is blocking the download.
AssemblyGenerator missing. Please reinstall MelonLoader or whitelist MelonLoader in your virus scanner.
Failed to contact MelonLoader API. Please make sure MelonLoader is allowed in your Firewall and that you are using MelonLoader $MLRelease$.
AutoWebProxyScriptEngine Error. Please open Window's "Change Proxy Settings" setting and disable all three toggles. Type `!proxy` if you need more help.
SocketException. Please open Window's "Change Proxy Settings" setting and disable all three toggles. Type `!proxy` if you need more help.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*due to: Could not load file or assembly '.*
unhollowerErrors.error: Failed to load critical files. Please reinstall MelonLoader or whitelist MelonLoader in your virus scanner. Make sure that there is no ` (#)` in any mod dll name.
<@102450956045668352> There has been an issue while running Cpp2IL. Please reupload this log into the [MelonLoader discord](https://discord.gg/2Wn3N2P).
<@102450956045668352> There has been an issue while running Cpp2IL. Please reupload this log into the [MelonLoader discord](https://discord.gg/2Wn3N2P).
Outdated MelonLoader. Please update MelonLoader to $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] System\.IO\.InvalidDataException: Central Directory corrupt\. ---> System\.IO\.IOException: Attempted to Seek before the beginning of the stream
unhollowerErrors.error: Failed to unzip. Make sure that MelonLoader can download zips successfully, try deleting corrupted zip, and that a antivirus is not corrupting it.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*The WOF driver encountered a corruption in the compressed file's Resource Table.
unhollowerErrors.error: WOF driver error. You may have a corrupt Windows install and you should try validating. [Article on how to](https://www.thewindowsclub.com/the-wof-driver-encountered-a-corruption-in-the-compressed-files-resource-table-dism-error) as well as a video at the bottom.
Some foreign files are causing issues. Please remove everything that you don't see in the image below.$cleanunity$

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*Operation did not complete successfully because the file contains a virus or potentially unwanted software.
unhollowerErrors.error: Failed virus check. Please reinstall MelonLoader and do not edit any MelonLoader files.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'HarmonyLib.AccessTools' threw an exception.*
unhollowerErrors.error: IPA or something else is conflicting with MelonLoader. Please remove everything that you don't see in the image below.$cleanunity$
No Support Module Loaded. Assembly Generation most likely failed. Please reinstall MelonLoader or whitelist MelonLoader in your virus scanner.
Out of RAM. This is likely a DDR3 memory issue. Maybe try an older version of MelonLoader.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] System.Net.WebException: The remote server returned an error: \(404\) Not Found.
unhollowerErrors.error: Something failed to download. Make sure nothing is blocking downloads and try again later.

Something is broken in MelonLoader. Try reinstalling MelonLoader. If that doesn't work, try cleaning your game install. For VRChat, remove everything that you don't see in the image below.$cleanunity$

Failed to execute Cpp2IL. Downgrade to proton 5, re-setup the `version` library in protontricks, run the game once, then switch back to default proton. Alternatively, you can try to change the launch commands in steam to `PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%`, though this isn't tested.

unhollowerErrors.previousLineRegex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Unhandled Exception: System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
unhollowerErrors.error: AssemblyUnhollower NRE. Please reinstall MelonLoader and make sure that a virus scanner is not removing files.
Failed to Initialize Assets Manager. If you are using Turkish, That could be the problem.

knownErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[INTERNAL FAILURE] Failed to Read Unity Version from File Info or globalgamemanagers!
knownErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to read your Unity version and game name. Please update MelonLoader to $MLRelease$ or delete UnityCrashHandler64.exe.
Mod config has became nulled. Please delete `game\UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg`
Mod config has Unescaped Char. Please fix `game` on line number `linenumber`

knownErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Settings load failed: System\.InvalidOperationException: The document has errors:.*
knownErrors.error: Mod config has been corrupted. Please delete `UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg`
Mod config has invalid escape sequence. Please delete `UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg`

knownErrors.regex: .*Il2CppAssemblyGenerator\\Config\.cfg: Tomlet.Exceptions.(TomlEOFException|TomlEndOfFileException): Found unexpected EOF on line (?<linenumber>\d+) when parsing TOML file
knownErrors.error: Config has been corrupted or empty as it ends on line linenumber. Please remove MelonLoader\Dependencies\Il2CppAssemblyGenerator\Config.cfg

knownErrors.regex: .*UserData\\MelonPreferences\.\w{3,4}: Tomlet.Exceptions.(TomlEOFException|TomlEndOfFileException): Found unexpected EOF on line (?<linenumber>\d+) when parsing TOML file
knownErrors.error: Mod config has been corrupted or empty as it ends on line linenumber. Please remove UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg
Mod config has Invalid Values. Try removing UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg to regenerate config.

knownErrors.regex: .*Expecting a newline character at the end of a statement on line \d+, but found an unexpected ','
knownErrors.error: Please either delete `UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg` which will reset mod settings or manually replace all commas (`,`) in numbers with periods (`.`)
The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again.

knownErrors.regex: System.IO.InvalidDataException: Central Directory corrupt. ---> System.IO.IOException: An attempt was made to move the file pointer before the beginning of the file.
knownErrors.error: Please redownload the installer from [GitHub](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe) and try to install ML with it.
Please do not move VRCModUpdater.Core.dll out of your `VRChat\UserData` folder.
Please do not move the MelonLoader zip into your Mods/Plugins folder! Follow the provided tutorial on how to install MelonLoader or ask for help.
Please use forward slashes (`/`) in MelonPreferences.cfg
An invalid/broken mod attempted to load.
Please do not put the source zip in the Mods/Plugins folder. Either use the provided dll or compile the source yourself.
Cpp2IL failed to save generated dll, please make sure that a virus scanner is not blocking MelonLoader and that MelonLoader has write permissions.

knownErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] System\.Reflection\.TargetInvocationException: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation\. ---> System\.IO\.DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path .*\.tmp"\.
knownErrors.error: Temp folder does not exist. Please follow these directions to change your [temp folder](https://www.digitalriser.com/change-windows-temporary-folders-location.html).

DNS failed to resolve. Please set your Window's settings to use [CloudFlare](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/setup/windows/) or [Google](https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using#windows) DNS servers.
Do not leave zips in Mod/Plugin folder. Remove the zip and try again.

knownErrors.regex: .*(?<error>Please Make Sure Mod DLL Name Is .*)
knownErrors.error: error

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[OculusPlayspaceMover] \[ERROR] OVRCameraRig not found, this mod only work (i|o)n Oculus( for now!|! If u are using SteamVR, use the OVR Advanced Settings!)
VRChat.error: OculusPlayspaceMover does not work in SteamVR. Instead, it is recommended to use [OVR Advanced Settings](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1009850/) for playspace mover <https://youtu.be/E4ZByfPWTuM>.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[VRCX_Companion] \[ERROR] Failed to connect to VRCX IPC Server.*
VRChat.error: VRCX Companion can not find VRCX. Make sure VRCX is running or [install VRCX](https://github.com/Natsumi-sama/VRCX#how-to-install-vrcx)

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] System.Net.WebException: The remote server returned an error: \(404\) Not Found.*
VRChat.error:
Please download [emmVRCLoader.dll](https://dl.emmvrc.com/downloads/emmVRCLoader.dll) and move to **Mods** folder
or [VRCModUpdater](https://s.slaynash.fr/VRCMULatest) and move it to the **Plugins** folder.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] You have emmVRC's Stealth Mode enabled.*
VRChat.error: You have emmVRC's Stealth Mode enabled. To access the functions menu, press the "Report World" button. Most visual functions of emmVRC have been disabled.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] System.Net.WebException: Error: SecureChannelFailure.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to connect to emmVRC network. Please make sure that emmvrc.com is not blocked or try a VPN.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] Free-floating Task \(PopulateList\)} failed with exception.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to load your emmVRC favorites. Please make sure that emmvrc.com is not blocked or try a VPN.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] Free-floating Task \(SearchAvatars\)} failed with exception.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to search for avatars. Please make sure that emmvrc.com is not blocked or try a VPN.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] Free-floating Task \(Login\)} failed with exception.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to Login. Try turning off the network in the emmVRC setting and turning it back on.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] There was an issue initializing the network config\. Using defaults.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to initialize network config.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] System.Net.WebException: Error: TrustFailure.*
VRChat.error: Failed to validate the emmVRC server certificate. Make sure [thetrueyoshifan.com](https://thetrueyoshifan.com/mods/emmvrc/) is accessible, or try re-setting the Set Automatically option in your computer's Date & Time settings.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] System.Net.WebException: The remote server returned an error: \(502\) Bad Gateway.*
VRChat.error: Please open Window's "Change Proxy Settings" and disable all three toggles. It also could be a firewall blocking the connection. Type `!proxy` if you need more help.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] Your instance history file is invalid. It will be wiped.
VRChat.error: emmVRC instance history became corrupted and has been reset.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] System.Net.WebException: Error: ConnectFailure \(A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC servers timed out. There is either a heavy load or emmVRC servers are having some issues. Please wait while staff looks into the issue.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] emmVRC could not be accessed. Loading from disk, if possible...
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to access emmVRC servers and attempted to load cached copy.

VRChat.regex: at emmVRC.Hacks.CustomAvatarFavorites+<JumpToStart>.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to load Favorites. Please verify the integrity of VRChat or reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Exception in coroutine of type emmVRC.Hacks.EmojiFavourites.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC's Emoji Favorites is currently not working. We are working on fixing this issue.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[emmVRCLoader] \[emmVRCLoader] Error occur+ed while trying to update emmVRC: System.IO.(DirectoryNotFoundException|FileNotFoundException).*
VRChat.error: emmVRC Dev mode is on. Please make sure that the launch options are cleared.

VRChat.regex: .*emmVRC is currently running with developer mode enabled.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC Dev mode is on. Please make sure that the launch options are cleared as this can cause issues.

VRChat.regex: .*\[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] Unable to find field "currentPage" in QuickMenu
VRChat.error: Please click on the button UI Elements then try to dismiss the emmVRC notifications.

VRChat.regex: .*\[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] Error with platform icon: System\.NullReferenceException.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC failed to retrieve avatar's PC/Quest icon. This is a non-game breaking error and the emmVRC team is aware of this issue.

VRChat.regex: .*emmVRC encountered an exception while running OnSceneLoad of "emmVRC.Functions.PlayerHacks.FBTSaving":
VRChat.error: emmVRC fbt saving errored due to fbt not existing on the oculus version.

VRChat.regex: .*\[emmVRCLoader] \[ERROR] Could not load the programs JSON file. Please make sure everything is correctly formatted!
VRChat.error: emmVRC Programs is not formatted correctly. Try deleting `VRChat\UserData\emmVRC\programs.json` and relaunch VRChat.

VRChat.regex: .*emmVRC encountered an exception while running OnSceneLoad of.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC is having some issues because of the update. Please reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.

VRChat.regex: at VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.EndEmmCheck \(System.IAsyncResult asyncResult\) \[0x00022].*
VRChat.error: emmVRC servers are having some issues. Please wait while we work on it.

VRChat.regex: .*Exception in IL2CPP-to-Managed trampoline.*NullReferenceException.*
VRChat.error: emmVRC is throwing some harmless errors.

VRChat.regex: .*\[FavCat] \[WARNING] Image cache trim failed; assuming cache corrupted.*
VRChat.error: FavCat Image cache trim failed. Maybe try refetching favorites.

VRChat.regex: .*InstanceHistory.json file is corrupted and will need to be manually deleted.*
VRChat.error: It is likely that your `InstanceHistory.json` file is corrupted and will need to be manually deleted. Find it in the `VRChat/UserData` folder.

VRChat.regex: 'MoarBones: I hear you like bones~' *
VRChat.error: MoarBones is enabled. It is most likely the cause of your issues as it is an April fools joke.

VRChat.regex: .*Win32 IO returned 1224\. Path: (?<ReModCorePath>.*)
VRChat.error:
IO error 1224, try deleting:
`ReModCorePath`

VRChat.regex: .*VRC.*set_field_Private_MenuStateController_0.*
VRChat.error: ReMod.Core is outdated. Please delete the file `VRChat\ReMod.Core.dll` and relaunch VRChat

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ReMod] \[ERROR] System.MissingMethodException.*
VRChat.error: ReMod.Core is outdated. Please delete the file `VRChat\ReMod.Core.dll` and relaunch VRChat

VRChat.regex: .*Could not resolve type.*ReMod.Core.*
VRChat.error: ReMod.Core is erroring. Please delete the file `VRChat\ReMod.Core.dll` and relaunch VRChat

VRChat.regex: .*An internal error occurred. If this keeps happening, please contact Requi.*
VRChat.error: An internal error occurred. If this keeps happening, please contact Requi

VRChat.regex: .*ReModX is outdated - Download current version from the ReMod Discord!
VRChat.error: ReModX is outdated - Download current version from <#917473100403204116>

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ReModCE] \[ERROR] Could not login to ReModCE API:.*
VRChat.error: Failed to log into ReModCE API. Try restarting VRChat and log into ReModCE again.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ReModCE] \[ERROR] .*without having set a pin or being logged in.*
VRChat.error: No pin set for ReModCE. Open ReModCE's Avatar submenu and click on the set or enter your pin button.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ReModCE] \[ERROR] Failed creating AvatarHistoryComponent:
VRChat.error: Failed creating AvatarHistoryComponent. Delete recent_avatars.bin in VRChat\UserData\ReModCE

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[Advanced_Safety] \[ERROR] Exception in IL2CPP-to-Managed trampoline, not passing it to il2cpp: System.MissingMethodException: bool Il2CppSystem.Object.ReferenceEquals\(Il2CppSystem.Object,Il2CppSystem.Object\)
VRChat.error: Advanced Safety can get spammy in the console. Disabling "Enforce default sorting layer" in settings fixes that for now.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[Advanced_Safety] Verifier process failed with exit code.*
VRChat.error: Advanced Safety failed to load a bundle and prevented the bad avatar from loading.

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[WholesomeLoader] \[ERROR] Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReaderException: Error reading JObject from JsonReader.*
VRChat.error: Your TotallyWholesomeConfig.json is corrupted, you can delete it from `VRChat/UserData/TotallyWholesomeConfig.json`

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[WholesomeLoader] \[ERROR] Your WholesomeLoader mod is not up to date.*
VRChat.error: Your WholesomeLoader mod is not up to date

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[PrivateServer] \[ERROR] System.ArgumentException: The specified path is not of a legal form \(empty\).
VRChat.error: PrivateServer mod is not yet setup, Please follow [these step to set PrivateServer up](https://gitlab.com/george/privateservermod#configuration)

VRChat.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[PlayerList] \[WARNING] Couldn't get player entry in OnSetupFlagsReceived
VRChat.error: PlayerList is throwing some harmless warnings. It is safe to ignore these.

BloonsTD6.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] System.ArgumentException: No target method specified for class NKHook6.*
BloonsTD6.error: NKHook6 is no longer working. Please remove NKHook6 from your Mods folder.
all dartling is throwing a error and should be removed.

BONEWORKS.error: Please replace Boneworks Modding Toolkit with [ModThatIsNotMod](https://boneworks.thunderstore.io/package/gnonme/ModThatIsNotMod/).
No Melon files found. Please add some to `UserData\CustomItems\`

Demeo.regex: HouseRules.*Could not load file or assembly 'Newtonsoft.*
Demeo.error: Missing Newtonsoft. Please make sure to extract the entire HouseRules zip.

modSpecificErrors.AvatarStatsShowAuthor: AvatarStatsShowAuthor has been added to VRChat and can be removed.
modSpecificErrors.CleanConsole: CleanConsole has been added into MelonLoader and is no longer needed. Please remove CleanConsole from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.ClearVRAM: ClearVRAM is no longer needed as this bug is now fixed in VRChat.
modSpecificErrors.ClickFix: ClickFix has been added into VRChat and will cause VRChat to crash. Please remove ClickFix from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.CloseFix: CloseFix has been added into MelonLoader by adding `--quitfix` to the launch options. Please remove CloseFix from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.DesktopFOV: DesktopFOV is replaced by [NotOptifine](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/243/NotOptifine.dll) by another creator
modSpecificErrors.DiscordRichPresence-ML: DiscordRichPresence-ML has been added into VRChat and also no longer works and can be removed.
modSpecificErrors.DownloadFix: DownloadFix is no longer needed as this bug is now fixed in VRChat.
modSpecificErrors.MenuOverrender: MenuOverrender is no longer needed as this bug is now fixed in VRChat.
modSpecificErrors.Multiplayer Dynamic Bones: Multiplayer Dynamic Bones is replaced by [MultiplayerDynamicBonesMod](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/165/MultiplayerDynamicBonesMod.dll), please download and replace `DBMod.dll` with it.
modSpecificErrors.MultiplayerDynamicBones: Multiplayer Dynamic Bones is replaced by [MultiplayerDynamicBonesMod](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/165/MultiplayerDynamicBonesMod.dll), please download and replace `DBMod.dll` with it.
modSpecificErrors.NoSteamP2P: NoSteamP2P has been added into VRChat and should be removed from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.OG Sitting And Standing Icon: OG Sitting And Standing Icon is no longer needed since it's made for the old UI
modSpecificErrors.Player Volume Control: Player Volume Control has been added into VRChat and will cause issues. Please remove Player Volume Control from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.PlayerVolumeControl: Player Volume Control has been added into VRChat and will cause issues. Please remove Player Volume Control from your Mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.PortableMirror: PortableMirror is replaced by [PortableMirrorMod](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/197/PortableMirrorMod.dll) by another creator, please download and replace `PortableMirror.dll` with it.
modSpecificErrors.Portal Confirmation: Portal Confirmation is replaced by [AskToPortal](https://api.vrcmg.com/v0/mods/152/AskToPortal.dll) by another creator, please download and replace `PortalConfirmation.dll` with it.
modSpecificErrors.USpeakerPlaybackDelayFix: USpeakerPlaybackDelayFix is no longer needed as this bug is now fixed in VRChat.
modSpecificErrors.VRChat-TokenStealer-Doxer-IPGrabber-Avat: Do I seriously need to explain to you why<:Natsuki_Facepalm:828070877978951681>? Maybe take a look at [this](https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ) and reevaluate your life choices.
modSpecificErrors.Gurren Core: Gurren Core is no longer needed and should be removed from the mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.NKHook6: NKHook6 is broken and should be removed from the mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.Custom Items Framework: Please replace Custom Items Framework with [ModThatIsNotMod](https://boneworks.thunderstore.io/package/gnonme/ModThatIsNotMod/).
